comments.content:
I don’t know how these guys feel about it but I gotta tell you that it made me uncomfortable. When I said you could use my words for a fontplay, I didn’t understand that it would be on the board the next day. It felt very strange but I didn’t say a word. I am now.

No big thing, I’m still intact and functioning as well as ever (whatever that’s worth), just wanted to let you know how I felt…

peace

\> When I said you could use my words for a fontplay, I didn’t understand that it would be on the board the next day.

I’ll take that into consideration, and see of anyone else thinks this is not a good idea.

I have lots of fonts, and lots of images, but what to use for text is constantly a struggle. I check bumper sticker sites, quote sites, etc. for things to use. So I am so pleased when I find something that seems like it could be used.

I don’t see Nick in my IM window to see if he minds, and hrant can take it and dish it out, if I’m not mistaken.

\> The ‘A’ needs work.

Good eye!  
: )

I just noticed that there each of the alt characters are individually made, so I just switched some to the other versions.

If you kill your conjoined twin, is it murder, or  
self-mutilation? And can a minor be tried for that?

hhp

I believe it is called duoautocessation, it’s a new crime so the legislature would have to go to work…

And I don’t think it’s a “minor” offense.

peace

By the way fontplayer - I didn’t say it was a bad idea. It just took me by surprise…

peace
